question: About which of the following Frit Staal said, it is "the Rigveda set to music".
explanation: Samaveda is the "storehouse of knowledge of chants". According to Frits Staal, it is "the Rigveda set to music". It is a fusion of older melodies (saman) and the Rig verses. It contains notated melodies, and these are probably the world's oldest surviving ones.
